parameters.name: destination_key
parameters.label: destination_key
parameters.help: Destination key for this model; if unset they key is auto-generated.

parameters.name: training_frame
parameters.label: training_frame
parameters.help: Training frame.

parameters.name: validation_frame
parameters.label: validation_frame
parameters.help: Validation frame

parameters.name: classification
parameters.label: classification
parameters.help: Classification v. regression

parameters.name: response_column
parameters.label: response_column
parameters.help: Response column

parameters.name: ignored_columns
parameters.label: ignored_columns
parameters.help: Ignored columns

parameters.name: n_folds
parameters.label: n_folds
parameters.help: Number of folds for n-fold cross-validation (0 to n)

parameters.name: keep_cross_validation_splits
parameters.label: keep_cross_validation_splits
parameters.help: Keep cross-validation Frames

parameters.name: checkpoint
parameters.label: checkpoint
parameters.help: Model checkpoint to resume training with

parameters.name: override_with_best_model
parameters.label: override_with_best_model
parameters.help: If enabled, override the final model with the best model found during training

parameters.name: autoencoder
parameters.label: autoencoder
parameters.help: Auto-Encoder (Experimental)

parameters.name: use_all_factor_levels
parameters.label: use_all_factor_levels
parameters.help: Use all factor levels of categorical variables. Otherwise, the first factor level is omitted (without loss of accuracy). Useful for variable importances and auto-enabled for autoencoder.

parameters.name: activation
parameters.label: activation
parameters.help: Activation function

parameters.name: hidden
parameters.label: hidden
parameters.help: Hidden layer sizes (e.g. 100,100). Grid search: (10,10), (20,20,20)

parameters.name: epochs
parameters.label: epochs
parameters.help: How many times the dataset should be iterated (streamed), can be fractional

parameters.name: train_samples_per_iteration
parameters.label: train_samples_per_iteration
parameters.help: Number of training samples (globally) per MapReduce iteration. Special values are 0: one epoch, -1: all available data (e.g., replicated training data), -2: automatic

parameters.name: seed
parameters.label: seed
parameters.help: Seed for random numbers (affects sampling) - Note: only reproducible when running single threaded

parameters.name: adaptive_rate
parameters.label: adaptive_rate
parameters.help: Adaptive learning rate (ADADELTA)

parameters.name: rho
parameters.label: rho
parameters.help: Adaptive learning rate time decay factor (similarity to prior updates)

parameters.name: epsilon
parameters.label: epsilon
parameters.help: Adaptive learning rate smoothing factor (to avoid divisions by zero and allow progress)

parameters.name: rate
parameters.label: rate
parameters.help: Learning rate (higher => less stable, lower => slower convergence)

parameters.name: rate_annealing
parameters.label: rate_annealing
parameters.help: Learning rate annealing: rate / (1 + rate_annealing * samples)

parameters.name: rate_decay
parameters.label: rate_decay
parameters.help: Learning rate decay factor between layers (N-th layer: rate*alpha^(N-1))

parameters.name: momentum_start
parameters.label: momentum_start
parameters.help: Initial momentum at the beginning of training (try 0.5)

parameters.name: momentum_ramp
parameters.label: momentum_ramp
parameters.help: Number of training samples for which momentum increases

parameters.name: momentum_stable
parameters.label: momentum_stable
parameters.help: Final momentum after the ramp is over (try 0.99)

parameters.name: nesterov_accelerated_gradient
parameters.label: nesterov_accelerated_gradient
parameters.help: Use Nesterov accelerated gradient (recommended)

parameters.name: input_dropout_ratio
parameters.label: input_dropout_ratio
parameters.help: Input layer dropout ratio (can improve generalization, try 0.1 or 0.2)

parameters.name: hidden_dropout_ratios
parameters.label: hidden_dropout_ratios
parameters.help: Hidden layer dropout ratios (can improve generalization), specify one value per hidden layer, defaults to 0.5

parameters.name: l1
parameters.label: l1
parameters.help: L1 regularization (can add stability and improve generalization, causes many weights to become 0)

parameters.name: l2
parameters.label: l2
parameters.help: L2 regularization (can add stability and improve generalization, causes many weights to be small

parameters.name: max_w2
parameters.label: max_w2
parameters.help: Constraint for squared sum of incoming weights per unit (e.g. for Rectifier)

parameters.name: initial_weight_distribution
parameters.label: initial_weight_distribution
parameters.help: Initial Weight Distribution

parameters.name: initial_weight_scale
parameters.label: initial_weight_scale
parameters.help: Uniform: -value...value, Normal: stddev)

parameters.name: loss
parameters.label: loss
parameters.help: Loss function

parameters.name: score_interval
parameters.label: score_interval
parameters.help: Shortest time interval (in secs) between model scoring

parameters.name: score_training_samples
parameters.label: score_training_samples
parameters.help: Number of training set samples for scoring (0 for all)

parameters.name: score_validation_samples
parameters.label: score_validation_samples
parameters.help: Number of validation set samples for scoring (0 for all)

parameters.name: score_duty_cycle
parameters.label: score_duty_cycle
parameters.help: Maximum duty cycle fraction for scoring (lower: more training, higher: more scoring).

parameters.name: classification_stop
parameters.label: classification_stop
parameters.help: Stopping criterion for classification error fraction on training data (-1 to disable)

parameters.name: regression_stop
parameters.label: regression_stop
parameters.help: Stopping criterion for regression error (MSE) on training data (-1 to disable)

parameters.name: quiet_mode
parameters.label: quiet_mode
parameters.help: Enable quiet mode for less output to standard output

parameters.name: max_confusion_matrix_size
parameters.label: max_confusion_matrix_size
parameters.help: Max. size (number of classes) for confusion matrices to be shown

parameters.name: max_hit_ratio_k
parameters.label: max_hit_ratio_k
parameters.help: Max. number (top K) of predictions to use for hit ratio computation (for multi-class only, 0 to disable)

parameters.name: balance_classes
parameters.label: balance_classes
parameters.help: Balance training data class counts via over/under-sampling (for imbalanced data)

parameters.name: max_after_balance_size
parameters.label: max_after_balance_size
parameters.help: Maximum relative size of the training data after balancing class counts (can be less than 1.0)

parameters.name: score_validation_sampling
parameters.label: score_validation_sampling
parameters.help: Method used to sample validation dataset for scoring

parameters.name: diagnostics
parameters.label: diagnostics
parameters.help: Enable diagnostics for hidden layers

parameters.name: variable_importances
parameters.label: variable_importances
parameters.help: Compute variable importances for input features (Gedeon method) - can be slow for large networks

parameters.name: fast_mode
parameters.label: fast_mode
parameters.help: Enable fast mode (minor approximation in back-propagation)

parameters.name: ignore_const_cols
parameters.label: ignore_const_cols
parameters.help: Ignore constant training columns (no information can be gained anyway)

parameters.name: force_load_balance
parameters.label: force_load_balance
parameters.help: Force extra load balancing to increase training speed for small datasets (to keep all cores busy)

parameters.name: replicate_training_data
parameters.label: replicate_training_data
parameters.help: Replicate the entire training dataset onto every node for faster training on small datasets

parameters.name: single_node_mode
parameters.label: single_node_mode
parameters.help: Run on a single node for fine-tuning of model parameters

parameters.name: shuffle_training_data
parameters.label: shuffle_training_data
parameters.help: Enable shuffling of training data (recommended if training data is replicated and train_samples_per_iteration is close to #nodes x #rows)

parameters.name: missing_values_handling
parameters.label: missing_values_handling
parameters.help: Handling of missing values. Either Skip or MeanImputation.

parameters.name: sparse
parameters.label: sparse
parameters.help: Sparse data handling (Experimental).

parameters.name: col_major
parameters.label: col_major
parameters.help: Use a column major weight matrix for input layer. Can speed up forward propagation, but might slow down backpropagation (Experimental).

parameters.name: average_activation
parameters.label: average_activation
parameters.help: Average activation for sparse auto-encoder (Experimental)

parameters.name: sparsity_beta
parameters.label: sparsity_beta
parameters.help: Sparsity regularization (Experimental)
